meanings.definition: A group of six people or things.
meanings.sent1: At the party, we split into two sixers to play a game.
meanings.sent2: The teacher divided the class into two sixers for the group project.
meanings.sent3: The sixers of colorful balloons made the room look festive.
meanings.sent4: The sixers of birds chirping in harmony created a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: The sixers of cupcakes on the table were tempting everyone at the party.

meanings.definition: A series of six consecutive points scored in a game, especially in basketball.
meanings.sent1: The basketball team went on a scoring spree, netting two sixers in a row.
meanings.sent2: The player's impressive performance included hitting multiple sixers during the game.
meanings.sent3: The sixers on the scoreboard made the opposing team nervous.
meanings.sent4: Scoring two sixers back-to-back, the player was on fire.
meanings.sent5: The crowd erupted in cheers as the team scored a series of sixers.
